title: Elon Musk Pledges to Sell Tesla Stock if Twitter Voters Agree
sub_head: Billionaire CEO’s tweet comes amid debate over taxing wealthy Americans
body:
Elon Musk on Saturday said he would sell 10% of his stock holdings in Tesla Inc. if the move won backing in a Twitter poll, reinjecting himself into the debate over how some of the wealthiest Americans should be taxed.
“Much is made lately of unrealized gains being a means of tax avoidance, so I propose selling 10% of my Tesla stock,” the Tesla chief executive said on Twitter, adding, “I will abide by the results of this poll, whichever way it goes.”
